document_data.name: The Eye Tyrant
document_data.mainbody: '''The Eye Tyrant''' was a tavern in the [[Amn]]ian city of [[Esmeltaran]] during the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: The tavern was built in almost the center of Esmeltaran.
document_data.Services: The Eye Tyrant catered specifically to off-duty guards and bouncers, and refused to admit the typical tourists and resort-goers that came to Esmeltaran. It was an expensive place to visit, but provided good service for the money.
